summary: Clan Battle Born is put in chains and you are the new owner of one of Whiteruns mansions.
descriptionHtml:
Alfhild, Bergritte, Idolaf, Jon and Olfrid Battle-Born is hanging in the Dragonsreach dungeon,
Lars Battle-Born has sett off to Honohall in Riften.

Player gain Ownership of \"House of Clan Battle Born\" now named House of your clan.

All storage is safe other than the chest at the entrance that is named Respawn.


                      -- Should be enabled after the -Missing in Action Quest. --

            -- Note! (small SPOILER) This will BREAK the thieves guild quest -Imitation Amnesty, render the Thieves guild questline uncompletable -- 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

v.1.1 - A more player friendly house with added basement in witch has enchanting and alchemy station.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install:
Use Nexus mod manager

or extract file to Skyrim/Data folder.


This file is not ment to upset anyone, i for once just didn`t like the Battle Borns much so i made this file for my amusement, if you dont like it or get offended by it dont download.

If you like it please Endorse =)

With Best Regards
Meyer189
author: Meyer189
